# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. This product has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards and offers exceptional value. I'm extending this opportunity to you with an exclusive offer. For a limited time, you can purchase it for $95. This is a fantastic deal considering its quality and the benefits it provides. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your experience with our product. Let me know if you're interested! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
